about_the_game:
In this strategic turn-based deck-building game, you'll take on the challenge of defending settlements with carefully chosen cards, buildings, and strategies. This demo gives you a first taste of the adventure, allowing you to experience the Green Forest phase with its unique challenges.

WHAT'S INCLUDED IN THE DEMO

  • The Green Forest Phase: 15 levels filled with battles, treasures, shops, campfires, and a climactic boss fight.

  • Play as the Dwarven Class: Focus on defense-oriented strategies, fortifying your settlements and enduring enemy assaults.

  • Procedurally Generated Maps: Each run features a dynamically generated path, ensuring a unique experience every time.

  • Deck-Building & Strategy: 30 distinct cards to collect and use in battle.

  • Powerful Relics: 8 relics to enhance your strategies and gameplay.

  • Diverse Enemy Encounters: Face 10 different enemy battles, leading up to the first boss.

  • Settlement Defense: Construct 10 unique buildings, each with 3 upgrade levels, to strengthen your defenses.

  • Status Effects: Utilize 5 different statuses that impact battles in strategic ways.

Can you withstand the rising tide of darkness and master the art of deck-building and strategy? Try the demo and begin your journey in Kingdom Fortress!

name: Kingdom Fortress Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Build strategic fortifications, deploy loyal troops, and defend the settlements of Valora. In this turn-based deck-building demo, manage resources, unlock powerful cards, and battle through the perilous Green Forest against the encroaching darkness.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
